item.title: Customer Segmentation...with MLB players Pt. 1
item.dc:creator: Louis Oberdiear
item.description: Many businesses try to create customer segmentation to gain a greater understanding of their customer base. This post will show how this can be done from start to finish and how to interpret and validate the newly found segments. Throughout this example advice on how to do this with retail data is given.

item.title: Welcome to The Lob
item.dc:creator: Louis Oberdiear
item.description: Welcome to my new blog, The Lob. I plan on using this blog to to explain and practice various data science techniques using sports data.
